messages.subject: Re: *NEW* Samurai Archives Blog (New URL)
messages.msgSnippet: Here is a much better URL - my appologies for the extra long URL: http://blogs.delphiforums.com/japanesehistory/start Enjoy! ...
messages.messageBody:
Here is a much better URL - my appologies for the extra long URL:
http://blogs.delphiforums.com/japanesehistory/start

Enjoy!


--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Kitsuno"
<samurai-listowner@s...> wrote:
>

> goings-ons of the Samurai Archives, here is the site, which allows
> comments, and has an RSS feed like the old site:
>
> (yahoo might break the link up, you might have to cut and paste each
> section seperately)
> http://blogs.delphiforums.com/n/blogs/blog.aspx?webtag=japanesehistory
> <http://blogs.delphiforums.com/n/blogs/blog.aspx?webtag=japanesehistory>
>
>
> Here is the RSS feed (which will probably get broken up by Yahoo, but
> you can visit the blog and get it there if you want it):

http://acx.prospero.com/dir-app/acx/ActiveContent.aspx?type=blog&fmt=rss\

messages.subject: *NEW* Samurai Archives Blog (New URL)
messages.msgSnippet: A few days ago I started a new blog, and then suddenly Delphiforums now has blogs available, so I ve moved everything over there, since I have more control
messages.messageBody:
A few days ago I started a new blog, and then suddenly Delphiforums now
has blogs available, so I've moved everything over there, since I have
more control over that blog. So for anyone interested in following the
goings-ons of the Samurai Archives, here is the site, which allows
comments, and has an RSS feed like the old site:

(yahoo might break the link up, you might have to cut and paste each
section seperately)
http://blogs.delphiforums.com/n/blogs/blog.aspx?webtag=japanesehistory
<http://blogs.delphiforums.com/n/blogs/blog.aspx?webtag=japanesehistory>


Here is the RSS feed (which will probably get broken up by Yahoo, but
you can visit the blog and get it there if you want it):

http://acx.prospero.com/dir-app/acx/ActiveContent.aspx?type=blog&fmt=rss\
&webtag=japanesehistory




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
